## IndeterminateProgress class

Indeterminate linear progress indicator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class IndeterminateProgress extends Component<SimpleProgressProps> 
```

## Remarks

Continually growing and shrinking along the track until the process is complete. See [SimpleProgressProps](./react-native-material-kit.simpleprogressprops.md) for the available props.

Refer to [Guideline](https://material.io/design/components/progress-indicators.html#linear-progress-indicators) or [MDL implementation](http://www.getmdl.io/components/index.html#loading-section/progress)
